snippet.title: Little Cities | Sounds of the City Trailer | Meta Quest VR
snippet.description:
Every city has a story. What will yours be?

Little City is the cozy city creator developed by Purple Yonder and published by nDreams. Releasing on May 12th for both the Meta Quest and Meta Quest 2, available for just $19.99 / £14.99 / $19.99. Wishlist it right now here: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299/

In Little Cities, you'll craft beautiful islands in idyllic locations, keeping your residents safe and happy. Design the layouts, strategically plot amenities, and make a perfect city where your citizens love to live. Easy to pick up and play, but with lots to discover, Little Cities makes your biggest creations possible!

The game will receive up to 12 months of post-launch updates and DLC, with the first of which being hand tracking and cosmetics. Learn more here: https://twitter.com/nDreamsVR/status/1518953129626288129
----
💙 Wishlist the Game - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4988470131168299/
----
🏗️Developed by Purple Yonder
🧰Published by nDreams
----
👍 Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/user/nDreamsVR?sub_confirmation=1
----
💻 Learn More - http://ndreams.com/games/little-cities
----
🐦 Twitter - https://twitter.com/nDreamsVR
💬 Discord - https://discord.com/invite/ndreams
👽 Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/user/nDreamsVR
📱 TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@ndreamsvr
📷 Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ndreams_vr/
💼 LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/ndreams/

#LittleCities #VR
